c1.name: imbued bandages
c1.Description: these magically imbued bandages improve your natural Healing rate by 7.5% hp/h.

c2.name: elixir
c2.Description: this small elixir will instantly close most wounds.

c3.name: recuperation balm
c3.Description: this balm can regenerate even the ugliest old scars over time. +7.5% hp/h and unlocks the recuperation trait while it lasts.
